review.description: Great concept, Unique finds, Good, tasty food. I had whiting fish sandwich that I recommend. I haven't had this before so I can't compare it to anyone else's but I liked it a lot. It was made with Caputo's bread which has a crunch to it. Friendly staff. You support local businesses which is always a plus in my book. Not an extensive selection more like a sampling of things Brooklyn. I think they just opened so this might be why.
review.author: Lisa P.
